knowledge.title: Unreal Engine 4
knowledge.text: I have been using Unreal Engine 4 for about 5 years on and off as a hobbyist, I have interned with a German developer as a game developer using UE4. I am fluent when it comes to Blueprints in UE4, on the C++ side, I am proficient. My most recent side-project, a Diablo-like RPG, forced me to delve into the Gameplay Ability System and recreate the buttery smooth movement system of Diablo 3 in UE4 using Blueprints.

knowledge.title: Full Stack Development
knowledge.text: I couldn't choose if I wanted to do design UIs or plan application architectures, so I chose full-stack. The flexibility and variety of full stack development is just super addicting to me. Some of the new systems I delved into recently are OAuth and ElasticSearch for the Easy Blog project, providing advanced search and a centralized authentication system.
